thread.title: Celebrity Apprentice contestant Mel Greig disappointed by fellow competitor’s retweet of comment branding her a ‘murderer’
thread.title_full: Celebrity Apprentice contestant Mel Greig disappointed by fellow competitor’s retweet of comment branding her a ‘murderer’ | DailyTelegraph

author: ANNA VLACH
title: Celebrity Apprentice contestant Mel Greig disappointed by fellow competitor’s retweet of comment branding her a ‘murderer’
text:
FORMER radio presenter Mel Greig says she is deeply disappointed that a fellow Celebrity Apprentice contestant retweeted a comment that branded her a “murderer”.
Greig is appearing on the Channel 9 reality series with Hollywood gossip commentator Richard Reid, who she branded a “troll” for his actions.
Reid, who has close to 11,000 followers on Twitter, retweeted a tweet by Mark_Vic, posted on September 17, which read: “Not really happy about a Murderer @MelGreigRadio being on Celebrity Apprentice, so I am out, your (sic) fired Mel Greig #CelebrityApprenticeAU”
The comment referred to the 2012 death of British Nurse Jacintha Saldanha after she was prank-called by Greig and her on-air partner Michael Christian .
@SallyDemangos @Viksister @RReidsHollywood Richard I'm so astonished and disappointed that you would retweet this? Murderer?
— Mel Greig (@MelGreigRadio) October 2, 2015 Ms Saldanha, 46, was found dead on December 7, 2012, just days after answering a call from Greig and Christian, on Sydney’s 2DAYFM, who pretended to be the Queen and Prince Charles.
Ms Greig said her social media followers brought the tweet to her attention.
Other Stories Hero took five bullets to stop gunman 0 comments Police building had been ‘cased’ News 0 comments First wife ‘neglected’ by cricket legend Nsw Rochelle’s sad story remains Russell’s agony Sydney Confidential Family horrified by paedo’s history News NSW police worker, gunman shot dead Breaking News “I saw the initial tweet and blocked it, but to see a cast mate retweet it was being disappointing,” Greig told The Advetiser last night
“Jacintha Saldanha committed suicide. I did not kill her ... for profile person to encourage that kind of behaviour is irresponsible and disgusting.
“I’ve been debating on what to do with this tweet and given it’s mental health week from this Sunday, I want to remind you all to be understanding and compassionate with mental illness. A troll is a troll and that doesn’t bother me, but re-tweeting that message is irresponsible. I’m not angry at Richard Reid, just disappointed that a profile person world encourage this.”
The Advertiser was unable to contact Channel 9 for comment last night.

Originally published as Mel deeply hurt by nurse tweet
